name: neighbourhood-map
description: This project has been created to fulfill requirements for the Udacity Front-End Developer Nanodegree. It utilises an embedded google map centred on London. An AJAX request to Foursquare API is used to gather a list of 10 recommended historic sites in the vicinity which are located on the map with google map markers. A KnockoutJS view-model is used to handle the population of an interactive list sidebar with the site locations. Clicking the list items or the associated marker will open a google maps infoWindow with information on the location (address, rating, checkinCount, photo) retrieved from the initial XHR data.
